Skill Notes:

Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral

Features
Edges (4 points): Connections; Danger Sense; Fame; Fighter Hindrances: Can't Swim; Cautious; Suspicious+ Human Features: Adaptability

Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting

Suspicious+: Allies suffer -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
